column1: The quicksand areas in the Great Sand Dunes National Park
The quicksand areas in Morecambe Bay
column3: are well-known for their treacherous nature.

column1: The Great Victoria Desert in Australia is known for having areas of quicksand.
Quicksand is not typically named like geographic features such as mountains or rivers
column2: as it is a natural phenomenon that can occur in various locations. It forms in saturated
column3: loose sand when the sand is suddenly agitated
column4: causing it to behave like a liquid. Quicksand can be found near riverbanks
column7: and other areas where water saturates loose sand or silt.
